Product Sustainability
Creative Cloud Digital Subscriptions (Carbon Savings) 4M digital subscriptions added in 2015 reduced carbon by on average more 
than 90% vs. boxed Creative Suite
Adobe Document Cloud eSign Use (Carbon savings) 38M transactions completed in 2015 reduced carbon by on average more than 90% vs. paper workflows
Adobe Document Cloud eSign Use (Water and Wood Savings) Conversion from paper workflows saved at least 43M gallons of water & 14M pounds of wood in 2015
Adobe Connect Use 5.4B minutes of Adobe connect meetings potentially avoided 5.4M tonnes of CO  due to reduced air travel.
